programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Concerned parents Brendan and Michelle start a band that makes kids music. The Portland Nerd Council issues a Public Service Announcement. Malcolm & Kris have an uncomfortable lunch at a vegan restaurant. The Feminist Bookstore hosts a comedy night.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Following an environmental scandal, The Mayor steps down from office and moves off the grid. A dolphin discovers that plastic bags have been banned in Portland. Musicians compete in a Battle of the Gentle Bands.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: A temp worker hopes to turn her gig as Interim Mayor of Portland into a full-time job with Fred and Carrie's help. A wedding is interrupted. Local baristas draft a coffee shop manifesto. Kath and Dave struggle to find a table at a restaurant.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Peter and Nance practice hosting friends at the "Soft Opening" of their Bed and Breakfast. A magazine features a local furniture maker in their "Man Issue." Steampunks attend a convention. Fred takes a love interest on a bold third date.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: The City of Portland is overrun with art projects. Fred and Carrie's relationship is complicated by their roommate, Alexandra. A movie theater sells artisanal concessions. The consultants from "Japanese Toys, Cool Offices" get to work.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: The Rats decide to move out of their newly gentrified neighborhood. First-time parents read various child-rearing books. Gahvin and his girlfriend go to the movies. Carrie and Alexandra have dinner at a communal table.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Electricity is shut off for the entire City of Portland due to unpaid bills at the Mayor's Office. Peter and Nance have a mysterious guest at their bed and breakfast. Kath and Dave go into survival mode.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Kath and Dave attempt the ultimate Independence Day BBQ. The Mayor searches the deep web for truly spectacular fireworks. Guest starring Kyle MacLachlan and Jane Lynch.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: A young woman (Kirsten Dunst) is haunted by very informed ghosts. Doug and Claire make a big commitment to one another. Kath and Dave make the most of fifteen minutes. Sandra finally finds a soulmate. Fred is visited by a Date Fact Checker.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Ecoterrorists (including Olivia Wilde) protest animal testing at makeup company. Bryce and Lisa Rent it Out! Toni and Candace have a car wash. Fred misses hip hop.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: A celery salesman (Steve Buscemi) goes to great lengths to get celery back on the table. 911 dispatchers assure callers that it's beets. The Order Grill is open for lunch. Carrie declares social bankruptcy.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: A punk from the '80s wakes up from a coma. An e-mail goes neglected. Nina has surprising news for Lance. Malcolm and Kris tailgate a Prairie Home Companion live show. Carrie dates a tax lawyer.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Peter drives Nance to the emergency room. Spyke gets a car. Ghavin has some questions for a singer (Annie Clark) whose band is touring through Portland. Fred and Carrie have a garage sale.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Carrie and Fred go home after a concert. Fred has an idea for a music documentary. Peter is reunited with his old band, The Bahama Knights and his ex-wife lead singer (Maya Rudolph). Guest starring Maya Rudolph, Tuck & Patti, and Jeff Tweedy.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Kickstarter videos compete at the Can'ts Film Festival (hosted by Gus Van Sant). Toni and Candace coach the Portland Trail Blazers' dance team. Guest starring Gus Van Sant, Paul Allen, The Portland Trail Blazers & dancers.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Brendan and Michelle decide that it's finally time to try drugs. Carrie's brother (Josh Homme) comes to visit with his new boyfriend. Women and Women First is visited by the cops. Guest starring Kyle MacLachlan, Dan Savage, and Josh Homme.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Mr. Mayor (Kyle MacLachlan) unveils Portland's official 3D Printer. Santa is concerned about the future of Christmas. A minister (Ed Begley Jr.) reminds us that church is an option.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Portlandia gets away for the weekend to New Beavertown, Oregon. Toni and Candace lead a feminist moon retreat for women (including k.d. lang).

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.sub-title: The Story Of Toni And Candace
programme.desc: The origin story of the feminist bookstore. A merger between two corporate book retailers pits young, sexy, shoulder-pad-wearing Toni and Candace against one another in fierce competition to be head of the Chick Lit Department.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: A visit from Lance's mom and her new boyfriend puts pressure on Lance and Nina's relationship. Guest starring Justin Long.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: A series of health ailments creates a desperate search for medical solutions. Guest starring Ed Begley Jr. and Brigitte Nielsen.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: The Ecoterrorists travel to San Diego to take down their next target, Seaworld. Guest starring Jeff Goldblum and Natasha Lyonne.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Kath and Dave attempt the ultimate Independence Day BBQ. The Mayor searches the deep web for truly spectacular fireworks. Guest starring Kyle MacLachlan and Jane Lynch.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Portland's Dollar Store recruits Quinn as the face for their rebranding campaign. Spyke faces trial for making unlicensed Bart Simpson merchandise. Guest starring Ed Begley Jr., Matt Groening, and Oscar the Grouch.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Doug discovers that he is a male feminist. Sandra takes a rideshare for the first time. Guest starring Greta Gerwig and Graham Wagner.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Fred and Carrie's landlord moves into their house. Kath and Dave look to buy a new home for their next renovation project. Guest starring Steve Buscemi and Anna Gunn.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Kath and Dave scramble to rehearse for a karaoke party. Guest starring Vanessa Bayer, Jeff Goldblum, and Paul Simon.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Police begin profiling weirdos after arsonists burn down a taxidermy shop. Guest starring Paul Reubens and Olivia Wilde.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. The Flaming Lips headline Portland's Pickathon Music Festival. Brendan and Michelle attend the festival via drone. Two concertgoers go boy-crazy. Guest starring Alia Shawkat, Kyle MacLachlan.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. Fred wakes up with gray hair and sets out on a journey to find out how old he is. Carrie is faced with a life decision. Guest starring Kyle MacLachlan, Natasha Lyonne, Mitchell Hurwitz and Kumail Nanjiani.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. Fred wants to do something big with his life so he moves to Austin. Carrie is surprised when unexpected guests arrive and she finally experiences motherhood. Guest starring Alia Shawkat & Kyle MacLachlan.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. The Weirdos decide to go to the beach but are stalled when their hearse breaks down. An office worker is annoyed that everyone is using his brand new charger. Guest starring Glenn Danzig.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. Claire is finally fed up with Doug's childish behavior and breaks up with him. They both date new people and discover surprising things about themselves.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. Kath & Dave feel marginalized after an accident leaves them temporarily disabled. A car service app user dodges surge pricing by calling a cab. Joey gets an internship.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. Louis C.K. cancels a show in Portland due to a family emergency. Fred and Carrie are asked to judge a plume contest at a new vape store. Guest starring Steve Buscemi and Louis C.K.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. Portland is declared the most feminist city in the country, and Toni and Candace have to deal with the attention. The town opens a Femi-Mart.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. Lance gets glasses and joins an intellectual crowd. Nina hires a tutor to help her win over Lance's new friends.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Starring Fred Armisen and Carrie Brownstein. A tsukemen ramen monster is on the loose in Portland. The mayor tries to impress a major brand visiting Portland and enlists Fred and Carrie to help. Guest starring Kyle MacLachlan.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Fred and Carrie consult with a storytelling expert. A traveler checks into an unconventional hotel. The weirdos discover Bed, Bath and Beyond.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Fred doesn't dig Carrie's hunky new beau. A new couple goes to therapy. Drew and Andy question,

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Fred's new business may be more trouble than it's worth. Kate and Sam learn the perils of long distance love. Drew and Andy plan a funeral. Nina gives Lance a massage chair that changes everything.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Toni and Candace retire but there is still some unfinished business between them. Drew and Andy re-imagine gingerbread cookies. Peter and Nance try a new protein diet. The rats consider the charms of squirrels.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Fred has a marriage arranged. A couple opens a movie theater with a real at-home experience. A school hires a bully to teach children grit. A creepy guy keeps commenting

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Carrie looks for a new friend. Jill's office anxieties cause her to try a radical diet. Drew and Andy host a film festival. A scientist pitches the cure for modern life. Ghavin opens an elaborate box set.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Fred and Carrie help the Mayor secede Portland from the United States. The eco-terrorists receive an award for Best Protest. Peter thinks he might be Banksy. Dave and Kath leave passive-aggressive notes on cars.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Nina and Lance deal with an ant infestation. The mayor attempts to break a world record.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Carrie tries to improve her passenger rating on a ride sharing app. A local actor teaches a boss how to fire employees. The National Small Talk Convention takes place. Sandra develops a close relationship with her customer service representative.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Sandra teaches a pit bull self-control. Fred and Carrie attempt protesting for cyclist rights. Lisa and Bryce sell instant garbage. A couple explains alcohol to their adult son. Fred discovers models.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Spyke gets his old band back together. Podcasters investigate a police station. Candace brings Toni to her childhood summer home.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Toni & Candace get involved in women's healthcare. Peter & Nance deal with a sushi situation. Kathleen becomes the first female partner at her firm

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Fred & Carrie help Rachel navigate the world of dating apps. Kath & Dave take on an escape room. Joey tries therapy. Andy & Drew swear off women.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Nina & Lance tell the story of how they met. A couple uses distraction cancelling glasses. Peter & Nance look forward to breakfast.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Doug & Claire try an open relationship. A company uses VR for an important meeting. The Mayor waits for a helicopter. Fred steps on a snail.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Sandra discovers she can have it all. Portland adds more lanes to the freeway. Kath & Dave learn the art of taking photo booth pictures.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: The Mayor sets out to prove Portland's diversity. Text message drama unfolds during a business meeting. Activists on a hunger strike take a cheat day.

programme.title: Portlandia
programme.desc: Peter & Nance interact with celebs on social media. James rides his bike to work. Gil & George say Oh, Hello to Toni & Candace.
